item.title: [BEAM-9042] AvroUtils.schemaCoder(schema) produces a not serializable SchemaCoder
item.description:
After some recent change in the implementation of AvroUtils.schemaCoder(schema) the produced SchemaCoder is not serializable.

You can reproduce this by doing this:

final SchemaCoder<GenericRecord> avroSchemaCoder = AvroUtils.schemaCoder(schema);
CoderProperties.coderSerializable(avroSchemaCoder);
